name: Fallback (itch)
description:
Fallback, a return in the past. 

It's a prototype of an ambitious idea. Made with Unity - C#.

Github : https://github.com/LythandeDc/FallbackV1

Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/fallbackgame/

A post in Italian language : http://antonella-dechiara.develop4fun.fr/it/progetto-unity-fallback/

A post in French language : http://antonella-dechiara.develop4fun.fr/projet-unity-fallback/

The game is not  completely "responsive design", the recommended resolution is 1024x768.
You can find this resolution in Fallback-ratio43.zip

Gameplay trailer :

Keys :

Left : the character goes left

Right : the character goes right

Space : jump

C : talk

V : attack

Enter : pauses the game

Left click mouse : actions ui of the game
